item.title: Tax Credit transactions and their risk associated
item.description: The Inflation Reduction Act’s investments are bearing fruit by creating good-paying jobs, strengthening our energy security, tackling climate change, and improving services the IRS provides to taxpayers. The IRA development in terms of tax credits, included: Extension of the production tax credit (PTC) and the investment tax credit (ITC) for electricity generated from wind, solar and certain other renewable resources. Expansion of the resources eligible for the PTC and ITC, including by allowing the ITC for energy storage technologies such as batteries.
